segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s spreading across the floor, and the woman is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s completely oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, taking cookies while she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how balanced the boy is on that stool—it’s almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often when the woman isn’t looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting worse, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don’t want to interrupt the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mix of calm and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
